knimeNode.name: Spark Compiled Transformations Applier
knimeNode.shortDescription: Executes the transformation code generated by a PMML Compiler.

intro.p: This node takes the data transformations bytecode produced by a PMML Compiler and runs it on the given data. To execute models, use the Compiled Model Predictor.
This node is typically used when test data shall be transformed e.g normalized the same way the training data has been transformed (e.g. using the "Spark Normalizer" node).

ports.inPort: The code generated from a PMML model
Spark RDD requiring transformation of some or all columns.
ports.outPort: The input data transformed according to the input model.
